Package itunesq

Class TrackDisplayColumns

java.lang.Object
itunesq.TrackDisplayColumns
public class TrackDisplayColumns extends Object
Class that represents the columns that are displayed for various track listings.

The following column set definitions exist:

  • Full - full list of tracks
  • Duplicates - list of duplicate tracks
  • Filtered - tracks that are displayed for a given query
  • Playlist - tracks that are displayed for a given playlist
  • Family - tracks that are displayed for a playlist family expansion

There are default values for each of these column sets, but most can be changed with user preferences.

Author:
Jon
